8  QObject(parent)
9 {
10  _running = false;

13 PlaybackActionClient::~PlaybackActionClient()
14 {
15  _playback_client->cancelAllGoals();
16  delete _playback_client;
17 }

19 void PlaybackActionClient::init()
20 {
21  _playback_client = new actionlib::SimpleActionClient<pumpkin_messages::PlaybackAction>("/pumpkin/playback_action", false);
22 }

24 void PlaybackActionClient::setPlaybackFilename(const QString &filename)
25 {
26  _goal.filenames.clear();
27  _goal.filenames.push_back(filename.toStdString());
28 }

30 void PlaybackActionClient::setSceneFilenames(const std::vector<std::string> &filenames)
31 {
32  _goal.filenames.clear();
33  _goal.filenames = filenames;
34 }
35 
36 void PlaybackActionClient::playbackFile() {
37  if (_goal.filenames.empty()) {
38  return;
39  }
40  ROS_INFO("Starting playback file %s", _goal.filenames[0].c_str());
41  _playback_client->sendGoal(_goal, boost::bind(&PlaybackActionClient::playbackDoneCallback, this, _1, _2),
42  boost::bind(&PlaybackActionClient::playbackActiveCallback, this),
43  boost::bind(&PlaybackActionClient::playbackFeedbackCallback, this, _1));
44 }
45 
46 void PlaybackActionClient::playScene()
47 {
48  if (_goal.filenames.empty())
49  return;
50  ROS_INFO("Start playing scene.");
51  _playback_client->sendGoal(_goal, boost::bind(&PlaybackActionClient::playbackDoneCallback, this, _1, _2),
52  boost::bind(&PlaybackActionClient::sceneActiveCallback, this),
53  boost::bind(&PlaybackActionClient::sceneFeedbackCallback, this, _1));
54 }
55 
56 void PlaybackActionClient::playbackStop() {
57  Q_EMIT(blockOnPlayback(false));
58  if (_running)
59  _playback_client->cancelGoal();
60  _running = false;
61 }
62 
63 void PlaybackActionClient::stopScene()
64 {
65  Q_EMIT(blockOnScene(false));
66  if (_running)
67  _playback_client->cancelGoal();
68  _running = false;
69 }
70 
71 void PlaybackActionClient::playbackActiveCallback() {
72  _running = true;
73  _scene = false;
74  Q_EMIT(blockOnPlayback(true));
75  Q_EMIT(sendStatusMessage(QString("Start playback file %0.").arg(QString::fromStdString(_goal.filenames[0])), 1000));
76 }
77 
78 void PlaybackActionClient::playbackDoneCallback(const actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState &goal,
79  const pumpkin_messages::PlaybackResultConstPtr &result) {
80  _running = false;
81  if (_scene)
82  Q_EMIT(blockOnScene(false));
83  else
84  Q_EMIT(blockOnPlayback(false));
85 
86  switch (static_cast<pumpkin_messages::IOState>(result->state)) {
87  case pumpkin_messages::IOState::BadFile:
88  Q_EMIT(sendStatusMessage(QString("Error: BAD. The playback file should be corrupted."), 1000));
89  ROS_ERROR("BAD FILE");
90  break;
91  case pumpkin_messages::IOState::EndOfFile:
92  Q_EMIT(sendStatusMessage(QString("Error: EOF. Reached End Of File before finishing the playback. Maybe ocurred some problems in recording."), 1000));
93  ROS_ERROR("END OF FILE");
94  break;
95  case pumpkin_messages::IOState::ErrorOpening:
96  Q_EMIT(sendStatusMessage(QString("Error: OPEN. There was an error opening file."), 1000));
97  ROS_ERROR("ERROR OPENING FILE");
98  break;
99  case pumpkin_messages::IOState::OK:
100  Q_EMIT(sendStatusMessage(QString("Playback terminated successfully."), 1000));
101  ROS_INFO("Playback executed with success.");
102  break;
103  default:
104  Q_EMIT(sendStatusMessage(QString("Fatal: UNKNOWN ERROR!"), 1000));
105  ROS_FATAL("UNKNOWN ERROR");
106  }
107  if (_scene)
108  Q_EMIT(scenePercentage(0, 0, 0));
109  else
110  Q_EMIT(playbackPercentage(0));
111  Q_EMIT(playbackFinished(result->state));
112 }
113 
114 void PlaybackActionClient::playbackFeedbackCallback(const pumpkin_messages::PlaybackFeedbackConstPtr &feedback) {
115  double perc = feedback->percentage;
116  perc*100;
117  Q_EMIT(playbackPercentage(int(round(perc))));
118 }
119 
120 void PlaybackActionClient::sceneActiveCallback()
121 {
122  _running = true;
123  _scene = true;
124  Q_EMIT(blockOnScene(true));
125  Q_EMIT(sendStatusMessage(QString("Start playing scene with %0 movements.").arg(_goal.filenames.size()), 0));
126 }
127 
128 void PlaybackActionClient::sceneFeedbackCallback(const pumpkin_messages::PlaybackFeedbackConstPtr &feedback)
129 {
130  double perc = feedback->percentage;
131  perc*100;
132  Q_EMIT(scenePercentage(feedback->movement_index, _goal.filenames.size(), int(round(perc))));
133 }
